headline: Judge Rejects Recusal Call By Weinstein
abstract: Mr. Weinstein said the judge in his rape trial should recuse himself after suggesting in court that the film producer could end up in jail.
lead_paragraph: Harvey Weinstein’s request that the judge presiding over his rape trial in Manhattan step aside was rejected on Thursday, ending an early salvo in the film producer’s attempts to mount an aggressive defense and cast doubt on the high-profile proceedings.
